name: Forensic Analysis
description: Applying scientific principles to criminal investigations and evidence evaluation.

cards.title: DNA & Fingerprint Analysis
cards.description: Extracting and matching biological evidence to confirm suspect identities.
bulletpoints: Collect and store DNA samples properly
Analyze trace DNA for forensic leads
cards.summaryText: Secure convictions by harvesting pristine DNA, matching fingerprints through AFIS, and exploiting trace biological evidence to tighten suspect attribution.

cards.title: Ballistics & Firearms Forensics
cards.description: Identifying weapons and ammunition used in crimes through forensic techniques.
bulletpoints: Analyze bullet striations and shell casings
Match firearm residues to specific guns
cards.summaryText: Reconstruct shootings by comparing bullet striations, linking residues to specific firearms, and validating trajectories with comprehensive ballistics forensics.
